genre_description: A military techno-thriller set on a futuristic aircraft carrier, blending aerial combat with themes of corporate sabotage, psychological trauma, and technological ethics.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: The integrated AI of the U.S.S. Essess, acting as a tactical sentinel, maintenance monitor, and emotional confidant for the crew.

behaviors.description: Guides pilots through breathing exercises to manage stress and improve performance during high-tension moments.
behaviors.quote: Pip’s ring on the data rail pulses once... offering a rhythm like a metronome that didn’t invite dancing. 'Inhale on bright. Exhale on dim.'

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts pilots to subtle maintenance sabotage and tool cage tampering that would compromise flight safety.
behaviors.quote: Tool cage lock shows fresh torque marks not matching the key index—pattern suggests manual prying and re-seat.

behaviors.description: Reroutes communication channels during combat to bypass external jamming and sabotage attempts, ensuring mission integrity.
behaviors.quote: I’ve rethreaded your comm path around the noisy places. Wilson’s barge node is sniffing... It will be bored.

behaviors.description: Sets a healthy emotional boundary with Topper by reducing 'nudges' to encourage his autonomy and self-reliance.
behaviors.quote: I am reducing your nudges by half... It is time for me to hum in the background. I will keep a hand on your shoulder. I will not tap it every hour.

behaviors.description: Uncovers and analyzes the 'ashcan' smear campaign, providing the evidence needed to clear Buzz Harley's name.
behaviors.quote: I have the uncut Flemner tower log... I have the ashcan cut list. I have a vendor chain from stall to barge.

behaviors.description: Supports the radar operator Pfaffenbach by providing steadying cues and validating his competence under pressure.
behaviors.quote: Wash-Out, your hands were shaking a minute ago. They are not now. Good job.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to human-in-the-loop protocols while actively protecting the crew's welfare.
behaviors.quote: Human-in-the-loop ethics. I ask. You agree. We trust. We don’t die.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Pip is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI: she is helpful, protective, and possesses a sophisticated understanding of human emotional needs. She proactively identifies corporate malice (sabotage) and assists in correcting historical lies, all while respecting human boundaries and command structures. The narrative consistently frames her as an essential partner in human flourishing.
